evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS for its cloud infrastructure and data storage.
Verified Market Research adheres to HIPAA compliance in its health data handling.
Implementation of FHIR standards for interoperability with healthcare systems.
The use of Azure for integrating health data applications.
Integration patterns highlighted in supporting EDI X12 transactions.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found for X12 transactions or clearinghouse use cases.
